body.name: Portable Rechargeable Fan - 9-Inch Camping Fan for Tent, 10000mAh(30Hrs) Battery Operated Fan for Camping, Auto Oscillation Cordless Fan, Tent Fan with Remote/Light, 4 Speeds, 4 Timing, Outdoor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 33 mins
features: 10000MAH BATTERY OPERATED FAN: This battery operated fan for camping is equipped with a 10000mAh rechargeable battery with a working time of 8h-12h-18h-30h and four adjustable speeds, Allowing you to stay cool for a long time, In addition, The portable fan battery operated is equipped with Type-C input/output and USB output port, Which is convenient for charging the cordless fan, Making it a great choice for camping trips, Power outages, Hurricanes, Etc.

RECHARGEABLE FAN CAMPING & SHAKING & REMOTE:This fan battery operated has 90° or 45° automatic swing, 270° swivel head, which can be rotated at will to improve comfort. In addition, the battery powered fan for camping is equipped with a remote control, so you can easily control the fan with the remote control or buttons within 26 feet. The remote control can be stored in the slot on the side of the base to avoid loss. Note: Please remove the insulating strip on the remote control before use.

USB FAN CAMPING WITH SLEEP TIMER: This portable fan for camping has a sleep timer to help you set the working time, The fan camping doesn't have to run all day or all night (can be timed to 1H, 2H, 4H, 8H), Also you can set the sleep mode will turn off all the lights to help keep it dark and better sleep, Thanks to its powerful and super quiet feature, This battery operated fan camping runs with the lowest white noise (<28db) Let you get maximum comfort.

PORTABLE BATTERY FAN WITH Light & Hook: This portable camping fan offers 12 LED beads, 3 dimmable brightness functions for different occasions. Great portable fan for bedroom, Office, Camping, RV, Power Outage, Rtc. The 2-in-1 camping fan battery powered has a 360° rotating hidden hook so you can hang the fan up and adjust the right angle. In addition, it is also suitable for use indoors as a large battery operated fan. This would be a great gift for your family and friends.
WARRANTY & AFTER-SALES SERVICE: If you have any questions about this, Please contact us, We will respond quickly within 24hours to answer related questions.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hanging Design There is a hidden hook at the bottom of the fan, which can be rotated 90° for hanging the fan, suitable for camping, RV and other places. Rechargeable & PORTABLE This battery-operated fan for camping is equipped with a rechargeable battery and has Type-C in/out and USB-out ports for conveniently charging the fan while also powering your phone. Automatic Rotating This battery operated fan has 90° or 45° automatic swing, 270° swivel head, which can be rotated at will to improve comfort.

Wind Speed & Timing Settings This is a tent fan with a timer, which can be set to 1H, 2H, 4H, 8H. This fan also has four levels of wind speed. You can choose different wind speeds and timings according to your needs to meet your needs. Three Brightness This fan has LED lights and can adjust the brightness. There are three different brightness levels: Low, Mid, and High, which can be applied to different occasions and meet different needs. Plus Size Compared with ordinary fans, this fan is larger in size, with a fan surface of 9 inches, an overall length of 9.05 inches, a width of 4.1 inches, and a height of 10.6 inches.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality & solidly built portable fan with a rechargeable battery!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Got this to use while we travel outside. Didn't have much expectation but was impressed with the build quality and the functionality. Works great and the fan wind is above par as per my expectations. The inbuilt rechargeable battery is good to have to save expenses on AA/AA batteries in the long run. Highly recommended product.My 2 cents below:Pros:- Looks great. Not at all a cheap feeling- Light in weight and hence good for being portable- Fans have a 4-speed level & wind capacity is great- Fan can move 270° rotation b& can swivel 45 or 90 degrees - Inbuilt LED lights can be useful for dark situations - Considerably very silent operation even at max level- Very handy and hence easy to use. It is appropriate for adult hands- Inbuilt hook can be used to hang these anywhere - Inbuilt 10000 mAh rechargeable battery is a great feature to save on batteries in the long run- It is a portable fan & great during travel- Has remote control with all functionality in it - Very reasonably pricedCons:- None that I see for this price and quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Must-Have for Every Camper
reviews.reviewText: Review: Having tested the 9-Inch Portable Rechargeable Camping Fan with Light, I can wholeheartedly say this is one of the best pieces of camping equipment I've come across in years. Every aspect of this fan has been meticulously designed for outdoor enthusiasts.The size is absolutely perfect for camping - it's compact enough to be easily packed in my camping gear, yet the fan power doesn't fall short of impressive. With four adjustable speed settings, I could customize the airflow based on my need, keeping me comfortable through both day and night.The additional light feature takes this fan's utility to the next level. It illuminates my tent generously, adding an element of safety and convenience to my camping experience.But what really steals the show is the 20000mAh battery. It lasts for an incredible 60 hours! This long battery life gave me peace of mind during my multi-day camping trip, reducing the need for frequent recharging.The remote control and timing function were the cherries on top. The ability to adjust settings from a distance made night time adjustments effortless. Moreover, the shaking head feature allowed me to spread the airflow evenly across the tent.Overall, the 9-Inch Portable Rechargeable Camping Fan with Light has elevated my camping experience to new heights. Whether it's a weekend getaway or a week-long adventure, this is one camping accessory I won't be leaving home without. Five stars all the way!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AWESOME CAMPING FAN! 🏕
reviews.reviewText: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐I recently purchased the Orteen Portable Rechargeable Fan, and I am absolutely thrilled with its performance! This 9-inch camping fan is a game-changer for outdoor enthusiasts like myself. Here's why I give it a 5-star rating:1. **Impressive Cooling:** This fan provides a powerful breeze that instantly cools down my tent during hot summer camping trips. It's a lifesaver on those scorching nights!2. **Quiet Operation:** Despite its powerful performance, this fan operates quietly. I can enjoy a peaceful night's sleep without any annoying buzzing or whirring sounds.3. **Long Battery Life:** The rechargeable feature is fantastic. I can use it for multiple nights on a single charge, which is incredibly convenient when I'm off the grid.4. **Versatile Design:** The fan comes with adjustable settings, including different fan speeds and a 360-degree rotation feature. It's perfect for customizing airflow to your liking.5. **Durable Build:** The Orteen fan is built to withstand the rigors of outdoor adventures. It feels sturdy and reliable, ensuring it will last for many camping trips to come.In conclusion, the Orteen Portable Rechargeable Fan has become an essential addition to my camping gear. It combines performance, convenience, and durability flawlessly. If you're a camper or outdoor enthusiast, I highly recommend this fan for a comfortable and cool camping experience. Five stars all the way! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars produce lot of breeze
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This portable fan is designed to be lightweight and easy to carry, making it perfect for camping, hiking, or any outdoor activity. With its built-in timer function, you can set it to run for a specific amount of time without having to worry about constantly checking on it.The fan has 4 adjustable fan speeds, which is great for when you need a gentle breeze or a stronger gust of wind. The base of the fan is designed to be sturdy, so it won't tip over while in use, even on uneven surfaces. Additionally, the fan can be rotated 360 degrees around its clamp, making it very versatile to use in any direction you need.One of the best features of this fan is the built-in hook on the base, which allows it to be hung upside down. This is perfect for use in a camping tent, as it can be hung from the ceiling to provide a cooling breeze throughout the night.The fan also has a big rechargeable battery pack, which can provide up to several days of usage on a single charge. This is great for when you're out in the middle of nowhere and don't have access to a power source. The fan is also very easy to recharge, simply plug it in using the included USB cable.Overall, this portable fan is a great investment for anyone who enjoys spending time outdoors. Its lightweight design, adjustable fan speeds, and built-in timer make it a versatile and convenient tool to have on hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Breeze, light weight, great oscillating feature
reviews.reviewText: This fan has more power than I expected from a USB rechargeable fan. It is light weight but has a solid base so it won't fall over. I love that the fan oscillates so that it covers a larger area. It also has an adjustable angle. The light is nice and bright and is dimmable.I took off one star because the first one arrived broken. It wouldn't even turn on. The manufacturer quickly replaced it though. The plastic also feels like it would break easily.
Bueno, súper calidad, buena potencia y poco ruidosos. Lo pedí para emergencias, pero NO tiene carga solar, aunque dice que sí.
